LIST_STEPS.STEP_2: Add mywish app in your Google Authenticator or in similar app

BLOCKCHAIN_BLOCK.TITLE: Choose Blockchain
BLOCKCHAIN_BLOCK.TEST_NETWORK_DESCRIPTION: Free of charge - for testing your contract before paying for it

CROWDSALE.TITLE: Crowdsale contract
CROWDSALE.DESCRIPTION: Start your ICO/Token sale with a few clicks

TOKEN_PROTECTOR.TITLE: Token Protector
TOKEN_PROTECTOR.DESCRIPTION: Protect your tokens in case of losing private keys

TOKEN.TITLE: Token contract
TOKEN.DESCRIPTION: Create a Token and distribute it yourself or by our Crowdsale Contract

EOS_TOKEN_MYWISH.TITLE: Token Contract based on MyWish
EOS_TOKEN_MYWISH.DESCRIPTION: Create a token for any needs, ready for ICO and exchanges. MyWish account will be shown as token creator.

EOS_TOKEN_PERSONAL.TITLE: Personal Token Contract
EOS_TOKEN_PERSONAL.DESCRIPTION: Create a token for any needs, ready for ICO and exchanges. You account will be shown as token creator.

TRON_TOKEN.TITLE: Token Contract
TRON_TOKEN.DESCRIPTION: Create a token for any needs, ready for ICO and exchanges.

TRON_GA.TITLE: Game Asset
TRON_GA.DESCRIPTION: Create assets for your TRON-based game. Mint unique assets to the users.

TRON_AIRDROP.TITLE: Airdrop
TRON_AIRDROP.DESCRIPTION: Distribute any TRC-20/TRC-223 tokens among many addresses (for example, after Bounty program or Crowdsale)

AIRDROP.TITLE: Airdrop
AIRDROP.DESCRIPTION: Distribute any ERC-20/ERC-223 tokens among many addresses (for example, after Bounty program or Crowdsale)

MATIC_AIRDROP.TITLE: Airdrop
MATIC_AIRDROP.DESCRIPTION: Distribute any MRC-20 tokens among many addresses (for example, after Bounty program or Crowdsale)

BNB_AIRDROP.TITLE: Airdrop
BNB_AIRDROP.DESCRIPTION: Distribute any BEP20 tokens among many addresses (for example, after Bounty program or Crowdsale)

EOS_AIRDROP.TITLE: Airdrop
EOS_AIRDROP.DESCRIPTION: Distribute any EOS tokens among many accounts (for example, after Bounty program or Crowdsale)

INVESTMENT_POOL.TITLE: Investment pool
INVESTMENT_POOL.DESCRIPTION: The contract for ETH accumulation before the investment. Create it and share the address with others.

BNB_INVESTMENT_POOL.TITLE: Investment pool
BNB_INVESTMENT_POOL.DESCRIPTION: The contract for BNB accumulation before the investment. Create it and share the address with others.

LOST_KEY.TITLE: Lost key
LOST_KEY.DESCRIPTION: The smart contract has all the same features as the standard Ethereum wallet and, in addition, redirecting your funds to the backup wallet, if you will lose the access/private key.

BNB_LOST_KEY.TITLE: Lost key
BNB_LOST_KEY.DESCRIPTION: The smart contract has all the same features as the standard Binance smart chain wallet and, in addition, redirecting your funds to the backup wallet, if you will lose the access/private key.

TRON_LOST_KEY.TITLE: Lost key for Tokens
TRON_LOST_KEY.DESCRIPTION: The Lost Key smart contract ensures your (TRC-20 standard) tokens and redirects them to backup wallets, if you lost the access/private key or in case of a long inactivity period of time (death, accidents, etc..).

ETH_LOST_KEY.TITLE: Lost key for Tokens
ETH_LOST_KEY.DESCRIPTION: The Lost Key smart contract ensures your (ERC-20 standard) tokens and redirects them to backup wallets, if you lost the access/private key or in case of a long inactivity period of time (death, accidents, etc..).

BNB_TOKENS_LOST_KEY.TITLE: Lost key for Tokens
BNB_TOKENS_LOST_KEY.DESCRIPTION: The Lost Key smart contract ensures your (BEP20 standard) tokens and redirects them to backup wallets, if you lost the access/private key or in case of a long inactivity period of time (death, accidents, etc..).

DEFERRED.TITLE: Deferred payment
DEFERRED.DESCRIPTION: Smart contract makes payment on a specified date.

WILL.TITLE: Will contract
WILL.DESCRIPTION: Setup the transfer of funds to family or friends, in case of long inactive period of time (death, accidents & so on).

WEDDING.TITLE: Wedding contract
WEDDING.DESCRIPTION: Wallet with Multisig function & distribution of funds between the owners after/during specified period of time.

EOS_WALLET.TITLE: Create EOS Account
EOS_WALLET.DESCRIPTION: Create an account on EOS blockchain
EOS_WALLET.EOS_DESCRIPTION: For EOS account creation please go to the contracts.mywish.io

LIST.LIST_ITEM_1: Contracts/Accounts in Test Net are free for use (you can create & deploy it to test network)
LIST.LIST_ITEM_2: Please accept low speed for deployment (up to 3 hours)
LIST.LIST_ITEM_3: Contracts in Test/ Main network have identical code
LIST.LIST_ITEM_4_OLD: Please use Test Net addresses (Ropsten for ETH) while working with contracts
LIST.LIST_ITEM_4: Please use Test Net addresses while working with contracts

LIST_1.LIST_ITEM_2: Choose Will contract & set it up. MyWish generates your personal smart contract.
LIST_1.LIST_ITEM_3: Make a payment & MyWish deploys the contract to the RSK network.
LIST_1.LIST_ITEM_4: Smart contract is deployed & ready for execution.

LIST_2.LIST_ITEM_1: User regularly calls the contract to confirm its’ "live" status.
LIST_2.LIST_ITEM_2: If no confirmation during the specified timeframe is detected, the contract distributes the funds to heirs.

EXTERNAL_DEVELOPERS.TITLE: External Developers
EXTERNAL_DEVELOPERS.DESCRIPTION: If you need any kind of custom development please fill the form below.

DESCRIPTION.LABEL: Your Request
DESCRIPTION.PLACEHOLDER: Please describe what kind of the development do you need (new blockchain creation, token contract, individual smart contract etc.)

EOS_ACCOUNT.LABEL: Send EOS to:
EOS_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: You can send EOS tokens from an exchange or your EOS personal account. You can create account here: https://contracts.mywish.io/createAccount

EOSISH_ACCOUNT.LABEL: Send EOSISH to:
EOSISH_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: You can send EOS tokens from an exchange or your EOS personal account. You can create account here: https://contracts.mywish.io/createAccount

MEMO_FIELD.LABEL: Fill MEMO field:
MEMO_FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Please enter your unique code to MEMO field during the payment. It's unique for your account on MyWish platform.

TRON_ACCOUNT.LABEL: Send TRON to:
TRON_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: You can send EOS tokens from an exchange or your EOS personal account. You can create account here: https://contracts.mywish.io/createAccount

TRONISH_ACCOUNT.LABEL: Send TRONISH to:
TRONISH_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: You can send EOS tokens from an exchange or your EOS personal account. You can create account here: https://contracts.mywish.io/createAccount

NOTE.TEXT: After replenish you will not be able to transfer/exchange tokens. You can use it only for contracts creation inside the Platform

BTC_ATTENTION.TEXT:
You will receive tokens after 5 BTC blocks confirmation.
The approximate time of the transaction is 1 hour.

LIST.LIST_ITEM_2: Choose Send Ether & Tokens tab in your wallet
LIST.LIST_ITEM_4: Enter Amount to Send and choose ETH or WISH
LIST.LIST_ITEM_7: Confirm the payment by pressing the button "DONE"

DISCLAIMER.ITEM_1: For adding accounts & amount of tokens you need to upload the table in *.csv format
DISCLAIMER.ITEM_2: Every row must contain one account in EOS (column A) and amount of tokens to distribute (column B)
DISCLAIMER.ITEM_TEXT: There are 2 types of the format for amount of tokens field. For example, your token has 18 decimals and you want to send 26.5 tokens to somebody. If you choose “No Decimals” you need to put 26.5 to column B. “With Decimals” - 26500000000000000000 (26.5 * 10^18).

DISCLAIMER.ITEM_1: For adding accounts & amount of tokens you need to upload the table in *.csv format
DISCLAIMER.ITEM_2: Every row must contain one account in TRON (column A) and amount of tokens to distribute (column B)
DISCLAIMER.ITEM_TEXT: There are 2 types of the format for amount of tokens field. For example, your token has 18 decimals and you want to send 26.5 tokens to somebody. If you choose “No Decimals” you need to put 26.5 to column B. “With Decimals” - 26500000000000000000 (26.5 * 10^18).

DISCLAIMER.ITEM_1: For adding addresses & amount of tokens you need to upload the table in *.csv format
DISCLAIMER.ITEM_2: Every row must contain one address (column A) and amount of tokens to distribute (column B)
DISCLAIMER.ITEM_TEXT: There are 2 types of the format for amount of tokens field. For example, your token has 18 decimals and you want to send 26.5 tokens to somebody. If you choose “No Decimals” you need to put 26.5 to column B. “With Decimals” - 26500000000000000000 (26.5 * 10^18).

ENTER_PROMO_BLOCK.DESCRIPTION: You can enter promo code and get a discount

WEDDING.TITLE: Wedding contract
WEDDING.DESCRIPTION:
Please fill the form below and specify your wishes.
Our technical team will contact you as soon as possible.
You can also reach us by email: support@mywish.io or using our online chat.

CUSTOM.TITLE: Custom contract
CUSTOM.DESCRIPTION: We will develop and deploy any smart contract, just provide us with your requirements.
CUSTOM.FORM_DESCRIPTION:
Please fill the form below and specify your wishes.
Our technical team will contact you as soon as possible.
You can also reach us by email: support@mywish.io or using our online chat.

MANAGEMENT_ADDR.LABEL: Management address
MANAGEMENT_ADDR.DESCRIPTION: Owner of this address will be able to manage the contract (it's the only one)

SEND_TO_WALLET.LABEL: Send to wallet
SEND_TO_WALLET.PLACEHOLDER: Enter the address of the recipient's wallet
SEND_TO_WALLET.DESCRIPTION: Enter the recipient's {{blockchain || 'ETH'}} address. This address will get transfer.

NOTIFICATION_EMAIL.LABEL: E-mail for notification
NOTIFICATION_EMAIL.DESCRIPTION: Enter e-mail address to which we send notification about transfer.

DATE_OF_TRANSFER.LABEL: Date of transfer
DATE_OF_TRANSFER.DESCRIPTION: Enter the contract's conditions - specify when it will make the transfer.

MANAGEMENT_ADDR.LABEL: Management address:
MANAGEMENT_ADDR.DESCRIPTION: Owner of this address will be able to manage the contract (it's the only one)

TOKEN_ADDRESS_ON_OFF.LABEL: Set Token
TOKEN_ADDRESS_ON_OFF.DESCRIPTION:
Specify the token which shall be distributed after the investment. Choose "Off" if you would like to set it later.
It CAN'T be changed after setting it up.

TOKEN_ADDR.LABEL: Token contract address:
TOKEN_ADDR.DESCRIPTION: Specify the address of the token which you would like to distribute

HARD_CAP.LABEL: Pool volume (maximum)
HARD_CAP.DESCRIPTION: Defines maximum volume for the pool. After reaching maximum no more contributions to pool are accepted.

SOFT_CAP.LABEL: Pool volume (minimum)
SOFT_CAP.DESCRIPTION: Defines minimum {{currency || 'ETH'}} needed for investments. If minimum is not reached - contributors get their {{currency || 'ETH'}}s back. You can set it to 0 (no minimum).

START_DATE.LABEL: Start date
START_DATE.DESCRIPTION: Start date/time for opening the pool. No contributions to the pool will be accepted before that time.

FINISH_DATE.LABEL: Finish date
FINISH_DATE.DESCRIPTION: Finish date/time for closing the pool. No contributions to the pool will be accepted after that time.

CHANGING_DATES.LABEL: Changing dates
CHANGING_DATES.DESCRIPTION:
Start/Finish Dates can be changed manually after Contract Deployment. You can prolong sale or finish it early.
Otherwise, dates are hardcoded and can`t be changed.

WHITELIST.LABEL: Whitelist
WHITELIST.DESCRIPTION: Contract will accept the contributions from defined addresses only. You can add addresses at any moment.

MIN_MAX_INVESTMENTS.LABEL: Min & Max investments limitations
MIN_MAX_INVESTMENTS.DESCRIPTION: You can specify minimum/maximum accepted contributions (in {{currency||'ETH'}}). For example, accept contributions from 0.05 {{currency||'ETH'}} to 3000 {{currency||'ETH'}} only

MIN_INVESTMENTS.LABEL: Minimum
MIN_INVESTMENTS.DESCRIPTION: Minimum accepted amount. "0" = No minimum limitation

MAX_INVESTMENTS.LABEL: Maximum
MAX_INVESTMENTS.DESCRIPTION: Maximum accepted amount. it can not be higher than the hard cap

INVESTMENT_ADDRESS_ON_OFF.LABEL: Set Destination
INVESTMENT_ADDRESS_ON_OFF.DESCRIPTION:
Set Destination for the investments. Choose "Off" if you would like to set it later.
It CAN'T be changed after setting it up.

INVESTMENT_ADDRESS.LABEL: Destination address:
INVESTMENT_ADDRESS.DESCRIPTION: {{currency || 'ETH'}} address for sending all funds from the pool. It can be Contract address. Double check it before the submission.

BONUS.LABEL: Personal bonus (in Tokens) for the pool's owner:
BONUS.DESCRIPTION: Usually 0.1-1%. % of pool's tokens (after successfull investment) will be sent to pool's owner.

HARD_CAP_INVEST.LABEL: Everyone after MAX
HARD_CAP_INVEST.DESCRIPTION: Everyone can initiate investment after MAX reaching. Off - only contract's owner can do it.

SOFT_CAP_INVEST.LABEL: Everyone after MIN
SOFT_CAP_INVEST.DESCRIPTION: Everyone can initiate investment after MIN reaching. Off - only contract's owner can do it.

PLATFORM_AS_ADMIN.LABEL: Control by MyWish:
PLATFORM_AS_ADMIN.DESCRIPTION:
ON is recommended - after sending the funds, you will be able to call the destination contract via MyWish.
If Off - only the owner of the contract can do it.

DATE_OF_CONFIRMATION.LABEL: Define how often you want to confirm your access to the management address
DATE_OF_CONFIRMATION.DESCRIPTION: You will need to send transaction to the contract from management address every time. If no transactions in confirmation period are sent, all funds will be send to reserve address after transaction to the contract from any address except the management address.

MANAGEMENT_ADDR.LABEL: Management address
MANAGEMENT_ADDR.DESCRIPTION: Owner of this address will be able to manage the contract (it's the only one)

RESERVE_ADDRESS.LABEL: Reserve address
RESERVE_ADDRESS.PLACEHOLDER: Enter the address of the recipient's wallet
RESERVE_ADDRESS.DESCRIPTION: Specify the backup address to which you want to send funds in the event that a private key is lost from the management address

SHARE.LABEL: Share
SHARE.DESCRIPTION: You can divide the funds between several reserve accounts. Choose percentage for every reserve address.

NOTIFICATION_EMAIL.LABEL: E-mail for notification
NOTIFICATION_EMAIL.DESCRIPTION: Enter the e-mail address to which you want to send a message about transferring the crypto currency

FIELDS.CONDITIONS_TEXT: Enter Conditions for the wallet's activity
FIELDS.CONDITIONS_DESCRIPTION: Enter the contract's conditions - specify when it will make the transfer.

MANAGEMENT_ADDR.LABEL: Management address
MANAGEMENT_ADDR.ETH_DESCRIPTION: ETH address (not exchange address). This address will manage the will contract. Double check the address (and access to it) before submission
MANAGEMENT_ADDR.BNB_DESCRIPTION: BNB address (not exchange address). This address will manage the will contract. Double check the address (and access to it) before submission
MANAGEMENT_ADDR.RSK_DESCRIPTION: This address will manage your contract. You can create it by Jaxx wallet. Double check it before submission.

YOUR_EMAIL.LABEL: Your Email for remainder & notifications
YOUR_EMAIL.DESCRIPTION: We will remind you to confirm "live" status & send notifications about the contract

BENEFICIARY_ADDR.LABEL: Beneficiary address
BENEFICIARY_ADDR.ETH_DESCRIPTION: Enter ETH address of beneficiary. After contract execution funds will be sent to that address.
BENEFICIARY_ADDR.BNB_DESCRIPTION: Enter BNB address of beneficiary. After contract execution funds will be sent to that address.
BENEFICIARY_ADDR.RSK_DESCRIPTION: Enter RSK address of beneficiary. After contract execution funds will be sent to that address. Heir can create it by jaxx too.

BENEFICIARY_EMAIL.LABEL: E-mail for notification
BENEFICIARY_EMAIL.DESCRIPTION: Enter e-mail address to which we send notification about transfer

FIELDS.CONDITIONS_TITLE: Define how often you want to confirm your "Live" status

CONFIRMATION_EVERY.LABEL: Confirmation transaction every
CONFIRMATION_EVERY.DESCRIPTION: You will need to send transaction to the contract from management address every time.

CONTRACT_EXPIRATION.LABEL: Will contract expiration
CONTRACT_EXPIRATION.DESCRIPTION: After due date all funds will be send to management address if all confirmations received at time.

CANCEL_VIA_MYWISH.LABEL: Cancel contract via MyWish
CANCEL_VIA_MYWISH.DESCRIPTION: If "On" you will be able to Cancel the contract and get all funds back by 1-Click on MyWish.

CONFIRM_LIVE_VIA_MYWISH.LABEL: Confirm "Live" via MyWish
CONFIRM_LIVE_VIA_MYWISH.DESCRIPTION: If "On" you will be able to Confirm "Live" status by 1-Click on MyWish.

BOTH_VIA_MYWISH_TEXT.DESCRIPTION: Off mode for both options are more secured, but less convenient for use. You will need to install Metamask for management the contract. On options give you ability to manage the contract by MyWish.

TOKEN_ACCOUNT.LABEL: EOS Token account
TOKEN_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: This EOS account shall be new. Token contract will be released to this account. The name should be connected with the project and token. For example, "mywishtoken".

TOKEN_SYMBOL.DESCRIPTION: The name of your token. 1-7 caps letters are accepted (like EOS, BTC, WAVES).
TOKEN_SYMBOL.ALREADY_NAME_TEXT: Token name is already in use

DECIMALS.DESCRIPTION: Define the decimals for your token. 0-15 are accepted. 4 as a standard value.

TOKEN_OWNER.DESCRIPTION: EOS account (not an exchange account). This account will manage the token. Double check the account (and the access to it) before the submission.

DEFINE_TOKENS.DESCRIPTION: Define the amount of tokens which shall be minted to EOS address. It must be less (or equal) than (Maximum-Total) supply.

MAXIMUM_SUPPLY.LABEL: Maximum supply:
MAXIMUM_SUPPLY.DESCRIPTION: Total supply of the Token. No more tokens can be created.

URI.TITLE: URI
URI.DESCRIPTION: Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for a given asset. The URI may point to a JSON file that conforms to the "ERC721 Metadata JSON Schema".

TOKEN_NAME.LABEL: Token name:
TOKEN_NAME.DESCRIPTION: Enter name of the project without spaces, usually 5-25 symbols. Lower and uppercase can be used

TOKEN_SYMBOL.LABEL: Token symbol:
TOKEN_SYMBOL.DESCRIPTION: Usually 3-4 Letters like ETH, BTC, NEO3, WISH etc.. Please check that it’s unique before submission (https://etherscan.com/tokens)
TOKEN_SYMBOL.DESCRIPTION_BNB: Usually 3-4 Letters like ETH, BTC, NEO3, WISH etc..
TOKEN_SYMBOL.DESCRIPTION_MATIC: Usually 3-4 Letters like ETH, BTC, NEO3, WISH etc..
TOKEN_SYMBOL.DESCRIPTION_HECOCHAIN: Usually 3-4 Letters like ETH, BTC, NEO3, WISH etc..
TOKEN_SYMBOL.DESCRIPTION_SOLANA: Usually 3-4 Letters like ETH, BTC, NEO3, WISH etc..
TOKEN_SYMBOL.DESCRIPTION_MOONRIVER: Usually 3-4 Letters like ETH, BTC, NEO3, WISH etc..
TOKEN_SYMBOL.DESCRIPTION_TRON: Usually 3-4 Letters like ETH, BTC, NEO3, WISH etc..
TOKEN_SYMBOL.DESCRIPTION_NEO: This symbol SHOULD be short (3-8 characters is recommended), with no whitespace characters or new-lines and SHOULD be limited to the uppercase latin alphabet (i.e. the 26 letters used in English)
TOKEN_SYMBOL.DESCRIPTION_XINFIN: Usually 3-4 Letters like ETH, BTC, NEO3, WISH etc..

DECIMALS.LABEL: Decimals:
DECIMALS.DESCRIPTION: Defines the number of decimals for the token. 0-{{max_decimals}} numerals are accepted. {{default_decimals}} as common practice
DECIMALS.DESCRIPTION_SOLANA: Defines the number of decimals for the token. 0-{{max_decimals}} numerals are accepted. {{default_decimals}} as common practice

TOKEN_TYPE.LABEL: Choose Type of Token
TOKEN_TYPE.DESCRIPTION_1: ERC-20 is recommended option. Accepted by the most exchanges.
TOKEN_TYPE.DESCRIPTION_2: ERC-223 is almost the same as ERC-20. Provides extra safety during token transfers.
TOKEN_TYPE.DESCRIPTION_3: BEP20 is recommended option. Accepted by the most exchanges.
TOKEN_TYPE.DESCRIPTION_4: ERC-223 is almost the same as BEP20. Provides extra safety during token transfers.

TOKEN_OWNER.LABEL: Token Owner
TOKEN_OWNER.DESCRIPTION: {{blockchain}} address (not exchange address). This address will be owner of the token (after sale end date). Double check the address (and access to it) before submission

RECIPIENT.TITLE: Define address for tokens (after minting it will be sent to this address)
RECIPIENT.DESCRIPTION_BLOCK: You can reserve the tokens for Team, Bonuses, Bounties - these tokens will be created, but can’t be sold until token sale completion.

RECIPIENT_ADDRESS.LABEL: Address
RECIPIENT_ADDRESS.PLACEHOLDER: Enter the address of the recipient's wallet

FUTURE_MINTING.LABEL: Future Minting
FUTURE_MINTING.DESCRIPTION:
Yes - you can create more tokens in the future & use token for Crowdsale.
No - no more tokens will be created in the future. Crowdsale is impossible.
FUTURE_MINTING.DESCRIPTION_NEO:
Yes - you can create more tokens in the future.
No - no more tokens will be created in the future.

AUTHIO.LABEL: Branded report
AUTHIO.DESCRIPTION:
Branded report is needed for exchanges and gives the estimation of the security of your token contract. Every contract is verified independently.
Branded report cost is $1500.
AUTHIO.SECOND_DESCRIPTION:
The service is run by an independent security analysis specializing company.
Check example.
AUTHIO.EMAIL_LABEL: To request a branded report please enter your email
AUTHIO.EMAIL_DESCRIPTION: At this address you will receive an branded report of your contract. Please be careful and check it again.

VERIFICATION.LABEL: Etherscan Verification
VERIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: Source code verification provides transparency for users interacting with smart contracts.
VERIFICATION.DESCRIPTION_WITH_COST:
Source code verification provides transparency for users interacting with smart contracts.
Verification cost is $250.
VERIFICATION.SECOND_DESCRIPTION: This service is run by independent US based company specialised in security analyze.
VERIFICATION.STATUS_IN_PROCESS: Contract source code in the process of verification

WHITE_LABEL.LABEL: White label
WHITE_LABEL.DESCRIPTION: Contract from a blank address, with no mention and referrence to MyWish Deployer

CROWD_SALE.TITLE: Crowdsale contract

CAP_NOTE.TITLE: Please note!
CAP_NOTE.TEXT:
If softcap > 0 all investments are stored on the vault contract until the end of crowdsale.
If you need to get investments on your address right away set softcap = 0.

CROWD_SALE.CHART_TOKEN_DISTRIBUTED_MESSAGE: Max possible emission of tokens, no more tokens can be minted.

CHOOSE_TOKEN.LABEL: Choose token

ERRORS.CLOSED: You can't use this token. Final sale is already completed
ERRORS.RUNNING: You can't use this token until the previous sale is not completed

CHOOSE_TOKEN.DESCRIPTION: Create New Token or Choose existing one if you've already completed presale on MyWish platform
CHOOSE_TOKEN.DISTRIBUTED_DESCRIPTION: Shows how many tokens you have already distributed during pre-sale rounds (incl. reserved tokens for Team, Bounty, Bonuses if any)

CROWD_SALE_TYPE.LABEL: Choose Type of Crowdsale
CROWD_SALE_TYPE.DESCRIPTION_1: You can make as many pre-sale rounds as you want
CROWD_SALE_TYPE.DESCRIPTION_2: No sale is possible after final sale. No more tokens can be created after end date

STORAGE_ADDRESS.LABEL: Investments Storage Address
STORAGE_ADDRESS.DESCRIPTION: {{blockchain || 'ETH'}} address (not exchange address). All contributions will be sent to that address after finish date if soft cap is reached. Double check the address before entering it

TOKEN_RATE.LABEL: Token rate
TOKEN_RATE.DESCRIPTION: Defines the rate of your token. 1-100000 numerals are accepted. Usually 500-5000 tokens per 1 {{blockchain}}.

HARD_CAP.LABEL: Hard cap tokens
HARD_CAP.DESCRIPTION: Defines how many tokens can be sold. After reaching this number sale will be stopped automatically. 1-100,000,000,000,000 Numerals are accepted.

SOFT_CAP.LABEL: Soft cap tokens
SOFT_CAP.DESCRIPTION: Defines the minimum number of tokens that needs to be sold for the project continuation. If soft cap is not reached - contributors get their investments back, project gets nothing. You can set it to 0 (no soft cap).

START_DATE.LABEL: Start date
START_DATE.DESCRIPTION: Start date/time for sale. No contributions will be accepted before that time.

FINISH_DATE.LABEL: Finish date
FINISH_DATE.DESCRIPTION: Finish date/time. No contributions will be accepted after the set time. Can be finished before if hard cap is reached.

TRANSFERABLE.LABEL: Transferable:
TRANSFERABLE.DESCRIPTION: User can limit transfer of tokens from Contributors until token completion to reduce the speculations. Off is recommended.

AUTO_FINALIZE.LABEL: Finalize auto:
AUTO_FINALIZE.DESCRIPTION: Our system can finalize the contract (to make tokens transferable) automatically after end date (you can do it early if hard cap reached)

CHANGING_DATES.LABEL: Changing dates
CHANGING_DATES.DESCRIPTION:
Start/Finish Dates can be changed manually after Contract Deployment. You can prolong sale or finish it early.
Otherwise, dates are hardcoded and can`t be changed.

WHITELIST.LABEL: Whitelist
WHITELIST.DESCRIPTION: Contract will accept the contributions from defined addresses only. You can add addresses at any moment.

MIN_MAX_INVESTMENTS.LABEL: Min & Max investments limitations
MIN_MAX_INVESTMENTS.DESCRIPTION: You can specify minimum/maximum accepted contributions (in {{currency||'ETH'}}). For example, accept contributions from 0.05 {{currency||'ETH'}} to 3000 {{currency||'ETH'}} only.

MIN_INVESTMENTS.LABEL: Minimum
MIN_INVESTMENTS.DESCRIPTION: Minimum amount accepted. "0" = No minimum limitation.

MAX_INVESTMENTS.LABEL: Maximum
MAX_INVESTMENTS.DESCRIPTION: Maximum amount accepted. it can not be higher hard cap.

TIME_BONUS.LABEL: Bonus
TIME_BONUS.DESCRIPTION: Usually 0.1-100%.  How many extra tokens will be sent to contributor.

FIELDS.TIME_BONUS_TITLE: Please choose one of the options (or both) for bonus activation

DEPENDS_AMOUNT.LABEL: Depends on amount of sold tokens:
DEPENDS_AMOUNT.DESCRIPTION: Specify how many tokens shall be sold before bonus activation and when bonus deactivated

DEPENDS_DATE_TIME.LABEL: Depends on date/time:
DEPENDS_DATE_TIME.DESCRIPTION: Specify the time frame when bonus is active for everyone

FIELDS.TIME_BONUS_DESCRIPTION: You can define bonus depending on amount of sold tokens and time. For example, give extra 10% to the first week contributors

AMOUNT_BONUS.LABEL: Bonus
AMOUNT_BONUS.DESCRIPTION: Usually 0.1-100%.  How many extra tokens will be sent to contributor.

MIN_AMOUNT.LABEL: Min Amount
MIN_AMOUNT.DESCRIPTION: Minimum contribution for getting specified bonus

MAX_AMOUNT.LABEL: Max Amount
MAX_AMOUNT.DESCRIPTION: Maximum contribution for getting specified bonus{{last ? ' (you can left it empty if there is no limit)' : ''}}

FIELDS.AMOUNT_BONUS_DESCRIPTION: You can define bonus depending on contribution Amount. For example, give extra 5% tokens for 10+ {{currency || 'ETH'}} contributions

MANAGEMENT_ADDR.LABEL: Management address
MANAGEMENT_ADDR.DESCRIPTION: Owner of this address will be able to manage the contract (it's the only one)

TOKEN_ADDR.LABEL: Token contract address
TOKEN_ADDR.DESCRIPTION: Specify the address of the token which you would like to distribute

EOS_WALLET.TITLE: Create EOS Account
EOS_WALLET.DESCRIPTION: By our service you can create EOS account. For EOS account creation you need to pay for RAM

ACCOUNT_NAME.TITLE: Choose a name for your account
ACCOUNT_NAME.DESCRIPTION: The EOS account name is the main identifier it has to be unique. Contains letters and/or digits (1-5), and has 12 symbols.

HAVE_PUBLIC_KEY.TITLE: Do you have a public key?

ACTIVE_PUBLIC_KEY.TITLE: Enter your active public key
ACTIVE_PUBLIC_KEY.DESCRIPTION: Please make sure that you have corresponding private key before filling. You can use https://get-scatter.com/ or our service for private/public pair generation.

OWNER_PUBLIC_KEY.TITLE: Enter your owner public key
OWNER_PUBLIC_KEY.DESCRIPTION: Please make sure that you have corresponding private key before filling. You can use https://get-scatter.com/ or our service for private/public pair generation.

GENERATED_ACTIVE_PUBLIC_KEY.TITLE: Your active public key
GENERATED_ACTIVE_PUBLIC_KEY.DESCRIPTION: You Publiс Key will be available on MyWish anytime. But we recommend you to store the key on your PC or print it.

GENERATED_OWNER_PUBLIC_KEY.TITLE: Your owner public key
GENERATED_OWNER_PUBLIC_KEY.DESCRIPTION: You Publiс Key will be available on MyWish anytime. But we recommend you to store the key on your PC or print it.

GENERATED_ACTIVE_PRIVATE_KEY.TITLE: Your active private key
GENERATED_ACTIVE_PRIVATE_KEY.DESCRIPTION: Copy and print your private key NOW. You CAN’T get it later. MyWish does not store private keys.

GENERATED_OWNER_PRIVATE_KEY.TITLE: Your owner private key
GENERATED_OWNER_PRIVATE_KEY.DESCRIPTION: Copy and print your private key NOW. You CAN’T get it later. MyWish does not store private keys.

ADVANCED_SETTINGS.LABEL: Change Advanced Settings
ADVANCED_SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: You can change the default settings for the account if you need. Changing the values will affect the costs of the creation.

NET.LABEL: NET:
NET.DESCRIPTION: Network Bandwidth. Your bandwidth is temporarily used each time a transaction or action is done on the network.

CPU.LABEL: CPU:
CPU.DESCRIPTION: Processing Power. CPU needed for transaction and actions execution. The complicated actions require more time for execution (and more CPU).

RAM.LABEL: RAM:
RAM.DESCRIPTION: RAM is needed for storing the data on EOS blockchain.

FIELDS.GENERATE_KEYS_DESCRIPTION:
We can generate public/private keys or you can use other services like https://get-scatter.com/.
MyWish is not storing the keys, it generates it only.

CAP_NOTE.TEXT:
If softcap > 0 all investments are stored on the crowdsale contract until the end of crowdsale or until soft cap is reached.
If you need to get investments right away set softcap = 0.

ADMIN_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Admin account:
ADMIN_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: EOS account (not an exchange account). This account will manage the Crowdsale. Double check the account (and the access to it) before the submission.

CROWDSALE_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Crowdsale EOS account:
CROWDSALE_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: This EOS account shall be new. All contributors will be sent to contract under this account, the name should be connected with the project. For example, "mynewproject".

PROTECTED_MODE.LABEL: Withdraw before completion
PROTECTED_MODE.DESCRIPTION: Withdraw works only if soft cap reached. If On - the admin will be able to withdraw the contributions before making tokens transferable & sale completion. Off - no withdraw until tokens are not transferable.

ACCOUNT.TITLE: Account name:
ACCOUNT.AMOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Define the amount of tokens which shall be minted to EOS account.

MANAGEMENT_ACCOUNT.LABEL: Management account:
MANAGEMENT_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: Owner of this account will be able to manage the airdrop contract (it's the only one)

TOKEN_ACCOUNT.LABEL: Token account:
TOKEN_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: Specify the token contract which you would like to distribute

SYMBOL.DESCRIPTION: Enter the symbol of your token

ACCOUNTS_COUNT.LABEL: Number of accounts for distribution:
ACCOUNTS_COUNT.DESCRIPTION: Specify how many accounts will get your tokens. It can be 100 or even 50000 (max). Costs of the contract depends on the number.

PREVIEW.FREE_VERSION_MSG: In free version (Test Net) sources codes are not available for loading.
PREVIEW.DEFERRED_SOURCE_CODE: Your Deferred payment contract source code
PREVIEW.INVESTMENT_POOL_SOURCE_CODE: Your Investment Pool contract source code
PREVIEW.SUPPORT_CONTRACT_CODE: If you need any help or consult please contact us by email.
PREVIEW.ETHERSCAN_VERIFY_SUPPORT: If you need to verify contract on Etherscan please contact us by email.
PREVIEW.ETHERSCAN_VERIFY_SUPPORT_OR_FOLLOW: If you need to verify the contract on Etherscan please submit an request or follow the instructions:
PREVIEW.LIBRARIES_AND_FILES: Libraries & other files can be found here

VERIFY_INSTRUCTION.ITEM_1: Open contract address on etherscan
VERIFY_INSTRUCTION.ITEM_2: In Contract Code tab choose "Verify And Publish"
VERIFY_INSTRUCTION.ITEM_7_1: Remove the parameters from the Constructor Arguments field ABI-encoded
VERIFY_INSTRUCTION.ITEM_8: Others fields are not required. Press "Verify And Publish"

CONFIRM_LIVE.VARIANT_1:
Please confirm “Live” status before Next check: {{next_check|date:'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'}}

Last “Live” confirmation: {{last_reset ? (last_reset|date:'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') : '--'}}
CONFIRM_LIVE.VARIANT_2:
Funds have been distributed in accordance with the contract on {{last_check ? (last_check|date:'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') : '--'}}

Last “Live” confirmation: {{last_reset ? (last_reset|date:'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') : '--'}}
CONFIRM_LIVE.VARIANT_3:
Contract was cancelled, all funds were sent to the contract’s owner.

Last “Live” confirmation: {{last_reset ? (last_reset|date:'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') : '--'}}
CONFIRM_LIVE.VARIANT_4:
Contract was expired, contract’s owner should withdraw the funds.

Last “Live” confirmation: {{last_reset ? (last_reset|date:'yyyy-MM-dd') : '--'}}

TOKEN.EOS_TOKEN_INFO: To see the tokens and the distribution click on Token owner ({{token_owner_link}}) and choose "Action: issue" in "Other Actions" tab.

AUDIT.TITLE: Branded report
AUDIT.NO_AUDITED_DESCRIPTION: You can request a branded report from our security partner
AUDIT.FEEL_FORM_TEXT: Please fill the form for getting the report
AUDIT.AUDITED_DATE: The planned date of the branded report: {{auditedDate|date:'yyyy-MM-dd'}}
AUDIT.SUPPORT_DESCRIPTION:
If you have questions? you can send them to us at support@mywish.io or livechat.
We will contact you as soon as possible.

FORM_TEXTS.PART_1: Rock`n`block is a full service smart contract security firm focused of mitigating technical debt and security risk for projects building decentralised applications on Ethereum. Learn more
FORM_TEXTS.PART_2:
What you get:
1. A beautifully designed branded report with your company's branding (name, logo, URL)
2. A credible attestation that your token contracts have passed review and testing by security experts
Check an example

AUDIT.FORM_NOTICE: The branded report will be delivered in 3 working days by email after the date of payment.

VERIFICATION.TITLE: Verification by Etherscan
VERIFICATION.DESCRIPTION:
You can request verification by Etherscan

Etherscan is the leading BlockChain Explorer, Search, API and Analytics Platform for Ethereum, a decentralized smart contracts platform

Etherscan verification allows you approve token ownership to publish token logo on the Etherscan

VERIFICATION_BNB.TITLE: Verification by Bscscan
VERIFICATION_BNB.DESCRIPTION:
You can request verification by Bscscan

Bscscan is the leading BlockChain Explorer, Search, API and Analytics Platform for Ethereum, a decentralized smart contracts platform

Bscscan verification allows you approve token ownership to publish token logo on the Bscscan

CROWD_SALE.CROWD_SALE_CONTRACT: Crowdsale contract (All contributions shall be sent to this address)
CROWD_SALE.VAULT_ADDRESS: Vault contract (Investments storage until the end of crowdsale)

AIRDROP.PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION: After Contract deployment you will be able to add the list of the addresses for distribution.
AIRDROP.LOW_BALANCE:
Not enough tokens.
Please deposit the contract ({{require|separateNumber}} {{tokenSymbol}}) before the execution

SEND_TO_GROUP.TITLE: Send Tokens To
SEND_TO_GROUP.DESCRIPTION: The following addresses (#{{from}} - {{to}}) are included to the next group for sending

INVESTMENTS_POOL.SHARE_LINK: You can share your contract to contributors by this link:
INVESTMENTS_POOL.SEN_FUNDS_TX: Sending transaction on Etherscan

EOS_CROWDSALE.CROWDSALE_ACCOUNT: Crowdsale EOS account (All contributions shall be sent to this address)

ERRORS.TOKEN_IS_ALREADY: This token is already allowed to be sent

TOKENS_LOST_KEY.TOKENS_DESCRIPTION:
The contract makes your address safe in case you lost the access/private key.
It requires one transaction to send the owner address info to the token address, and the second transaction to confirm sending the tokens to the contract address.
After finishing the transactions, please confirm the changes in the contract.

ALLOW_TOKENS.TITLE: 1. Allow tokens
ALLOW_TOKENS.NO_AVAILABLE: No tokens are available to allowance.

ALLOW_TEXTS.MAIN:
Please allow the contract to send the tokens from your personal address to reserved addresses.
After allowing, please confirm the changes in the contract.
ALLOW_TEXTS.MAXIMUM_TOKENS: The maximum quantity of tokens in one contract is {{maximumTokens}}.
ALLOW_TEXTS.LIMIT_TOKENS:
You have reached the maximum number of tokens in the contract.
Please create a new one.

ADD_TOKENS.TITLE: 2. Add tokens
ADD_TOKENS.NO_AVAILABLE: No tokens are available for adding.

CONFIRM_TEXTS.MAIN: Please confirm each token or all tokens (recommended) on the list, so the contract can complete the transaction.
CONFIRM_TEXTS.NOT_CONFIRMED: Tokens which are not confirmed will not be sent to the reserved addresses.

SAVED_TOKENS.TITLE: Saved tokens {{confirmedCount}}/{{totalCount}}
SAVED_TOKENS.EMPTY_LIST: The list is empty, no tokens are available to be transferred.
SAVED_TOKENS.CONFIRMED_TOKENS: These tokens are confirmed to be sent to the reserved addresses.
SAVED_TOKENS.CONFIRMED_TOKENS_NOTE: Tokens which are not on the list will not be sent to the reserved addresses.

ALLOW.TITLE: Allow tokens
ALLOW.DESCRIPTION: To allow the contract to send the tokens from your personal address to reserved addresses please follow the following steps:

CONFIRM.TITLE: Add tokens
CONFIRM.DESCRIPTION: To confirm tokens on the list for saving, please follow the following steps:

CONFIRM_ACCESS.TITLE: Confirm access
CONFIRM_ACCESS.DESCRIPTION: To Confirm your address access and continue using the contract please follow the following steps:

CANCEL_CONTRACT.TITLE: Cancel
CANCEL_CONTRACT.DESCRIPTION:
After cancellation, the contract won’t be able to send your tokens to reserved addresses.
To cancel please follow the following steps:

MEETONE.TEXT:
We provide MEETONE users with a 15% discount.
The discount can be applied to the deployment of all EOS Accounts & Contracts.

Please enter the promo code MEETONE before making a payment.

EOSPARK.TEXT:
We provide EOSPark users with a 15% discount.
The discount can be applied to the deployment of all EOS Accounts & Contracts.

Please enter the promo code EOSPARK before making a payment.
